name: Monkey D. Luffy
devil_fruit: Hito Hito no Mi, Model: Nika (Mythical Zoan)
bio: Luffy set sail from Foosha Village to become the Pirate King. With the Nika fruit awakening and all three forms of Haki, he leads the Straw Hat Pirates with an unbreakable will and a knack for turning enemies into allies.

name: Roronoa Zoro
bio: The right-hand man of Luffy and a master of three-sword style. Trains relentlessly to become the world's greatest swordsman.

name: Nami
bio: Genius navigator and cartographer. Manipulates weather with the Clima-Tact and her ally Zeus, guiding the crew through impossible seas.

name: Usopp
bio: The crew's sharpshooter and storyteller. His creativity and courage often turn the tide in unexpected ways.

name: Vinsmoke Sanji
bio: Chivalrous chef who fights with devastating kicks. His Germa lineage awakened latent power, enhancing speed and durability.

name: Tony Tony Chopper
bio: A reindeer who ate the Human-Human Fruit. Brilliant doctor with a compassionate heart and adorable demeanor.

name: Nico Robin
bio: Survivor of Ohara and seeker of the True History. Her ability to sprout limbs and her calm intellect make her indispensable.

name: Franky
bio: Coke-powered cyborg and designer of the Thousand Sunny. A boisterous builder with a soft spot for family.

name: Brook
bio: Gentleman musician brought back to life by the Revive-Revive Fruit. His music and sword make for a chilling combo.

name: Jinbe
bio: Former Warlord and fish-man master of the seas. His calm leadership and ocean mastery make him the perfect helmsman.
